column18: 12/01/2014: A female assailant attacked a United States (US) teacher in the Reem Island mall, Abu Dhabi city, Abu Dhabi emirate, United Arab Emirates. The teacher, Ibolya Ryan, was killed in the attack. This was one of two attacks targeting US civilians carried out by the same assailant on the same day. An unknown group claimed responsibility for the incident and Dalal al Hashemi confessed to having carried out the attack.
column97: A butcher knife was used in the attack.
column126: \\"\"UAE: Stabbing of US teacher a 'lone terrorist act'"
column129: 2014.\",\"\"\"Suspect Is Held in Killing of American in Abu Dhabi"
column132: 2014.\",\"\"\"Woman who stabbed American teacher in Abu Dhabi didn't act alone"

column18: 12/01/2014: An explosive device was discovered outside the home of a Egyptian-United States (US) doctor in Abu Dhabi city, Abu Dhabi emirate, United Arab Emirates. The device was safely defused. An unknown group claimed responsibility for the incident and Dalal al Hashemi confessed to having carried out the attack.
column39: Residence of Doctor: M. H. H.
column97: A primitive bomb was used in the attack.
